axis.description: Set the columns to use for the chart's x and y axis.

x_axis_col.description: Name of the column to use for the x axis chart.

y_axis_col.description: Name of the column to use for the y axis chart.

altair.description: Use the Altair charts engine, which is the default engine.

w.description: Set the default width of charts.

example.code:
# Use this method to set the default chart width to 350 pixels
ds.w(350)

v.description: The width to set, in pixels.

h.description: Set the default height of charts.

example.code:
# Use this method to set the default chart height to 250 pixels:
ds.h(250)

v.description: The height to set, in pixels.

wh.description: Set the default width and height of charts.

example.code:
# Use this method to set the default chart width to 500 pixels
# and height to 200 pixels:
ds.wh(500, 200)

w.description: The width to set, in pixels.

h.description: The height to set, in pixels.
